double.desc:
The next click will be repeated
_(it counts for only one click but both cost must be paid)_
double.title: Double click

past.desc:
The next click will be repeated in the previous click round
_(it will allow to open room faster)_
past.fluff: Even faster that it goes through time.
past.title: Click in time

tdm.fluff: It travels back in time, always on the same amount of time: a run. But it did not replace the temporal line.

shop.disabled-continue-run: You should own a temporal machine to run again.

shop.no-artifacts: There are no more artifacts. Come back later.
shop.not-enough-TE: You don't have enough temporal energy. You should get {missing} more.

paper.fluff:
Blank paper sheets perfect to draw or to write anything.
A blank piece of paper is God's way of telling us how hard it is to be God.
paper.title: Papers

pencil.fluff: With a pencil you can start any dreams!
pencil.title: A pencil

about.author: Author
about.introduction: This is a simple game developed to test Svelte
about.purpose: The goal is to progress in the adventure by clicking on actions. But you have only 100 clicks to do so. However after 100 clicks, you restart at the beginning but all previous clicks ar still triggering. So with all clicks cumulated it is possible to progress though the adventure.
about.title: {gameTitle}: about

howto.explanation:
For one run, you have 100 clicks.
For one click, you should choose an action. Some actions give you some ressources, and some other will unlock new actions.
Actions may have a cost in ressource to be clickable, and some may need several clicks on them to be completed.
howto.explanation2: Choosing some actions will complete the story.
howto.explanation3:
When you have clicked 100 times. The run is over and you have to restart from the begining.
But all clicks done in previous runs will continue to be applied on actions.
For example, for an action that needs 2 clicks: On run #1, you clicked on it at click #10 and click #11 (which complete the action). So at run #2, if you do the same action at click #10 then the action will be completed immediately. And at run #3, this action will be completed at click #10 even if you choosed another action.
This mechanism helps you to progress faster and consequently to go further in the story with only 100 clicks.
howto.title: {gameTitle}: How to play?

resources.lost-click--details: Lost clicks are clicks in previous run which are not able to repeat their actions
